description:
A handy cutlery set for all your backcountry meals. The knife has a serrated edge and the fork has sharp tines, so they work like your favorite metal cutlery without the weight.

  • Made of durable polypropylene and glass composite to handle the rigours of the trail
  • Nesting handles and included carabiner holds set together
  • Dishwasher and microwave safe
name: Sea To Summit Camp Cutlery 3-Piece Set
